description:
Just when Seth decides to set out on a new journey after hearing what Yaga wrote in a letter to Alma, a massive number of Nemesis eggs rains down on Artemis Academy. The sorcerers of the city intercept them, but an egg they miss falls on an isolated island where Melie happens to be gathering mushrooms. Seth rushes to save her and fights the Nemesis that hatches from the egg, but its immense strength forces Seth into a corner, and his power once again goes berserk. Frightened by this inner power that he can`t control, Seth makes a decision...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In Search of the Future: Utopia
